article_title: CMS announces limited-time special enrollment period
article_text:
Free Health Payer Daily Newsletter More than 38,000 health plan executives read FierceHealthPayer to stay current on trends in healthcare payment reform, cost containment strategies, the ICD-9/ICD-10 transition, fraud prevention, and more. Sign up for FREE today!

article_metadata.description: Though the Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services has outlined how it will tighten the rules governing special enrollment periods, it also will add another SEP this year.
